localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Popl is the next generation business card! 📲 Business people put our NFC sticker on their phones to instantly share contact info with potential clients.
blogPost.body: Popl is the next generation business card! 📲 Business people put our NFC sticker on their phones to instantly share contact info with potential clients.
blogPost.title: Popl - Share your digital business card with a tap
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Popl是新一代的名片! 📲商务人士将我们的NFC贴纸贴在手机上，可以即时与潜在客户分享联系信息。
localize.tagline: 轻点一下就能分享您的数字名片

localize.description: Popl是新一代的名片! 📲商務人士將我們的NFC貼紙貼在手機上，可以即時與潛在客戶分享聯繫信息。
localize.tagline: 輕點一下就能分享您的數字名片

previous.excerpt: Keep up to date with which NFTs are being sold the most and for the highest values 💰💰. It's also nice to see a random NFT every now and then just to know whats out there 👀
previous.title: NFT of the Day - Your daily dose of the best NFTs

localize.description: 及时了解哪些NFT卖的最多，价值最高的💰💰。它也很高兴看到一个随机的NFT，然后只是为了知道有什么👀。
及時瞭解哪些NFT賣的最多，價值最高的💰💰。它也很高興看到一個隨機的NFT，然後只是爲了知道有什麼👀。
どのNFTが一番高く売られているのか、高値で売られているのか、最新の情報を得ることができます💰。たまにランダムなNFTを見て、何があるのか知るのもいいですね👀。
localize.tagline: 最高のNFTを毎日お届けします

localize.description: どのNFTが一番高く売られているのか、高値で売られているのか、最新の情報を得ることができます💰。たまにランダムなNFTを見て、何があるのか知るのもいいですね👀。
